scripts.start:gateway:dev: (pm2 delete ujs-gateway || true) && dotenvx run --env APP_ENV=api-gateway -- pm2 start nest --name ujs-gateway -- start
scripts.start:user:dev: (pm2 delete ujs-user || true) && dotenvx run --env APP_ENV=user -- pm2 start nest --name ujs-user -- start
scripts.start:system:dev: (pm2 delete ujs-system || true) && dotenvx run --env APP_ENV=system -- pm2 start nest --name ujs-system -- start
scripts.start:content:dev: (pm2 delete ujs-content || true) && dotenvx run --env APP_ENV=order -- pm2 start nest --name ujs-content -- start
scripts.start:order:dev: (pm2 delete ujs-order || true) && dotenvx run --env APP_ENV=order -- pm2 start nest --name order-order -- start
scripts.start:core:dev: yarn start:system:dev && yarn start:user:dev && yarn start:gateway:dev && pm2 logs
scripts.start:core:test: dotenvx run -f .env -f .env.test --overload -- yarn start:core:dev && pm2 logs
scripts.docker:build: (docker rmi mongodb:latest || true) && docker build -f docker/Dockerfile -t mongodb:latest .
scripts.mongodb:dump:dev: docker compose exec mongodb-primary bash -c "./mongodb-dump.sh dev"
scripts.mongodb:dump:prod: docker compose exec mongodb-primary bash -c "./mongodb-dump.sh prod"
scripts.mongodb:dump:test: docker compose exec mongodb-primary bash -c "./mongodb-dump.sh test"
scripts.api-gateway:prisma:generate: yarn user:prisma:generate && yarn system:prisma:generate && yarn content:prisma:generate && yarn order:prisma:generate
